title: cultural_data_Museum_of_Discovery_&_Science
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobile.mods.
Application Name: Museum of Discovery & Science.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: Bring the entire family to the Museum of Discovery and Science for a day of fun and exploration.  Use our new Mobile App to enhance your visit experience.   The App also lets you keep up-to-date with what’s happening at the Museum from the comfort of your own home! Key Features: • Stay Connected:  Keep in touch with all that's happening in the Museum straight from your phone including new IMAX films, new exhibits, new exhibits, special weekend events, sponsorship opportunities, and more.• AutoNation IMAX 3D Theater: See what's playing in the IMAX Theater plus you can order tickets.• Student-made Apps:  Check out the exhibits apps created by high schoolers from the APP-titude program featuring Augmented Reality (AR), quizzes, and videos. • Virtual Tour:  Take a virtual tour of the museum from your phone. • Built-in Maps:  Lost inside the Museum? Check out our maps to maximize your time or prepare for your next visit.The Museum’s Mobile App was created by Broward County high school students as part of APP-titude, the Museum’s two-year internship for high school juniors and seniors. The project was funded by United Way of Broward.Read moreCollapse.
